QuestData.Title: Trouble In The Mine
QuestData.Description: The Jorune Mine is in trouble!$b$bWe recently unearthed an exceedingly large and powerful arcane crystal; however, something has gone terribly wrong and the energy from the crystal is flooding the mine.$b$bThe Auchenai have already sent their Vindicators into the mine to assist us.$b$bSpeak with Vindicator Doruu inside of the mine, he'll know how you can help.
